in this post, i'm expressing my concern about the protection of personal information in the digital age. i'm questioning how safe our data really is, given that ceos of big tech companies like facebook are making millions while our private lives are being shared and exploited online. i'm calling for change and using the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy) to reach a wider audience and start a conversation around this issue.
